content: crochet this easy and beginner-friendly icicles crochet ornament bauble ball for your christmas tree with only basic crochet stitches pattern includes 1 video tutorial **the pattern can be purchased here as an ad-free printer-friendly pdf ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 adfree patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this pattern in an ornament crochet ebook with 40 crochet patterns and lots of tutorials and tips and 18+ videos right here 2 *** 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-ornament-patterns/ ref=ravelry
